mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (title, member_id, context) VALUES (#{title}, #{memberId}, #{context})
mapper.select: SELECT board_id AS boardId, member_id AS memberId, title, context, created AS createdDate FROM notice WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
SELECT board_id AS boardId, member_id AS memberId, title, context, created AS createdDate FROM notice ORDER BY created DESC

SELECT board_id AS boardId, member_id AS memberId, title, context, created AS createdDate FROM notice WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR context LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY created DESC
